location.zh-cn: 北京市复兴门外大街10号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国境内唯一的全国性工会联合会，是参加中国人民政治协商会议的人民团体之一。
description.en: The sole national trade union federation in the People's Republic of China, and one of the people's organizations participating in the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会的前身，隶属于中国共产党。
description.en: The predecessor to the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, affiliated with the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 由中国劳动组合书记部在广州召开的会议，会上决定成立中华全国总工会。
description.en: A conference convened by the China Trade Union Secretariat in Guangzhou, where the decision was made to establish the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 解放区总工会和国民党统治区工会联合召开的会议，会上决定恢复中华全国总工会。
description.en: A joint conference of trade unions from the Liberated Areas and Kuomintang-controlled areas, which decided to restore the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，曾于1927年查封中华全国总工会总部。
description.en: A major political party in the Republic of China, which sealed the headquarters of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 1948年作为团体会员加入中华全国总工会，1949年11月宣布解散，实现了全国工会运动的统一。
description.en: Joined the All-China Federation of Trade Unions as a group member in 1948 and announced its dissolution in November 1949, achieving the unification of the national trade union movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华全国总工会现任主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家和政治人物，中华全国总工会现任党组书记、副主席、书记处第一书记。
description.en: Chinese business executive and politician, current Party Group Secretary, Vice Chairman, and First Secretary of the Secretariat of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义理论家，曾任中华人民共和国主席，被推选为中华全国总工会名誉主席。
description.en: Chinese Marxist theorist who served as Chairman of the People's Republic of China and was elected Honorary Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，1948年当选为恢复后的中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, elected as the Chairman of the restored All-China Federation of Trade Unions in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，1948年当选为中华全国总工会副主席，主持总工会工作。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, elected as Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in 1948, overseeing its work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国国民党革命委员会的创始人和领导人之一，1948年当选为中华全国总工会副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, a founder and leader of the Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang, elected as Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国总工会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会的直属事业单位。
description.en: A directly affiliated public institution of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会直属的唯一一所普通本科高等学校。
description.en: The only regular undergraduate higher education institution directly affiliated with the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会主办的综合性报纸。
description.en: A comprehensive newspaper sponsored by the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际性的工会组织。
description.en: An international federation of trade unions.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织，是中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商的重要机构。
description.en: The organization of the patriotic united front of the Chinese people, and an important institution for multiparty cooperation and political consultation led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国劳动组合书记部是中华全国总工会的前身组织。
description.en: The China Trade Union Secretariat was the predecessor organization to the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次全国劳动大会上，与会代表决定成立中华全国总工会。
description.en: At the Second National Labor Congress, delegates decided to establish the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 第六次全国劳动大会决定恢复中华全国总工会。
description.en: The Sixth National Labor Congress decided to restore the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会是在中国共产党的领导下运作的。
description.en: The All-China Federation of Trade Unions operates under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会是参加中国人民政治协商会议的人民团体之一。
description.en: The All-China Federation of Trade Unions is one of the people's organizations that participate in the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1927年6月，中华全国总工会总部被中国国民党查封。
description.en: In June 1927, the headquarters of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions was shut down by the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1949年11月，中国劳动协会决定结束其组织，并入中华全国总工会，实现了全国工会运动的统一。
description.en: In November 1949, the China Labour Association decided to dissolve its organization and merge into the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, achieving the unification of the national trade union movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会曾经是世界工会联合会成员，在中苏交恶时退出，但至今仍保持“友好关系”。
description.en: The All-China Federation of Trade Unions was once a member of the World Federation of Trade Unions, withdrew during the Sino-Soviet split, but still maintains 'friendly relations'.

position.zh-cn: 党组书记、副主席、书记处第一书记
position.en: Party Group Secretary, Vice Chairman, First Secretary of the Secretariat

description.zh-cn: 担任全总常务副主席，主持总工会的工作。
description.en: Served as the Executive Vice Chairman of the ACFTU, presiding over the work of the federation.

description.zh-cn: 中国工人出版社是中华全国总工会的直属事业单位。
description.en: China Workers' Publishing House is a directly affiliated public institution of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 中国劳动关系学院是中华全国总工会直属的高等学校。
description.en: China University of Labor Relations is a higher education institution directly affiliated with the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 《工人日报》社是中华全国总工会的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Workers' Daily is a directly affiliated public institution of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions.
